price: 177. Cuando se abata sobre sus hogares, será un mal día para quienes fueron advertidos.
arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nazala bisāḥatihim fasāa ṣabāḥu al-mundharīna
